name: Time Crawler
description:
Hello everyone,  

I’m a new Unity dev and it’s the first time I participate a Game Jam. 

Let me introduce you my game : Time Crawler

 

My game is a dungeon crawler where every door you use lead you to a random room full of enemies, treasure, gold and time crystals !

This is how I wanted to approach the jam theme. Not original I agree but I wanted a dungeon crawler game inspired by games like “Binding of Isaac”, “Enter the gungeon”, etc. My rewind feature is this :

 

You start with 3 crystal shards ( and you can collect some during your run ! ) which allow you to get back in the last room you visited !

This mean a back in the past ! So every enemies, every items that you can buy will respawn too ! This can lead to some strategies like :

 

Enter a “shop “ room, buy some items but you don’t have enough gold to purchase them all,

Enter the next room by the door, kill some enemies and grind some golds then you can spend a crystal to get back in the shop room with some fresh golds to spend !

 

But beware ! Every room your enter or get back in (!!) will make your player a step closer from that evil floor boss !

This is why you should use your crystal wisely ! because you can get really early facing a difficult boss !

 

Keep in mind that EVERY doors lead to a random level !

That mean if you get back in a room then use the same door you used before will lead you to a total new room ! With new danger !

Maybe dodging this littles slimes room wasn’t a good idea when you saw 4 angry trolls waiting for you now !

 

This is how I used the theme ! Back in room, high risk but high reward or maybe low risk low rewards ! Who knows ? 😊

 

The game is divided by floor and rooms ! ( Only one main floor for the jam ! )

If you manage to beat the floor boss, you win !

 

Thanks you for reading or playing my very first game !
I'll keep it update and use review to make my game better and if i can afford some art i'll keep the dev on it !

I enjoyed doing this GameJam and I hope you will enjoy my game too 😊 Have a good game !

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Inputs to play are on the pause menu in the game ( ESCAPE) Or in the help section in the main menu !
